description:
*** This is an ongoing course, Lectures and sections are added every 2 weeks ***

Learning 3Ds max is rumored to be very tough, That's not true, we've found that the best way to learn something is to directly dive into, That's why we've made this course

  • In this course we'll walk with you step by step from the very first beginning to teach you 3ds max and vray by making some really neat models
  • We'll be building tons of stuff, you will learn the tools by practicing and you'll have good library of great models made by you at the end of this course
  • I will be including all project files needed for this as well as Textures and Materials

This course will last for a year, taking you from the very basics to the advanced stuff

If you watch the whole thing you'll become one of the industry professionals, Just be serious about it and follow all the instructions
title: Learn 3Ds Max and Vray by making projects
